trends: There has been one other sighting in Greenbrier
There were no other sightings in Greenbrier on or around June 30th 1988
divs: sighting detailsi was in my driveway one night.there was a summer storm coming in with lightning,but no rain as yet. i looked skyward and saw a round object flying silently completely below the clouds. it had about 16 white lights around it. they did not rotate or blink. the actual object was invisible except during lightning strikes. then it appeared clearly as a circular dark object. now we have the largest c-130 base in the country about 50 miles away and anyone around here sees dozens of them a day. using the familier aircraft as a reference my judgements are; the craft was maybe 1\2 to 2\3 in diameter the wingspan of a c-130. it flew considerably slower than a c-130. its altitude could not have been over 2000ft and i feel that it was half that. my mother also witnessed the event. the ufo flew from n to s with no deviation in course or speed. it disapeared over the horizen. i was excited. my mom and i both knew that what we had seen was a ufo.
Summary: Round object silently flew overhead during a thunderstorm. 16 or so white unblinking lights were arayed around it.
